name: Rusty6502
longDescription: A complete emulation of the MOS Technology 6502 microprocessor written in Rust. This project explores low-level system emulation, instruction set architecture implementation, and cycle-accurate timing simulation.

name: RemoteWindow
description: A window sharer app that shares windows over network
longDescription: Network-based window sharing application that allows real-time sharing of application windows across different machines. Research into remote desktop protocols, network streaming, and efficient graphics transmission.

name: TunnelExperiment
description: A middleman server that forwards incoming TCP requests to given server
longDescription: Experimental TCP proxy server that acts as a middleman for forwarding network requests. Research into network protocols, load balancing, connection management, and proxy server architectures.

name: LaserNet
description: A bi-directional laser communication research project for understanding timings bi-directional communication and package loss, made with microcontrollers
longDescription: Experimental bi-directional laser communication system built with microcontrollers to study optical communication protocols, timing synchronization, packet loss analysis, and signal integrity in free-space optical networks. This project explores the challenges of implementing reliable communication over laser links.
